text:
It hasn’t happened in a long time that the songs of a movie have gripped the entire nation. If you still have doubts, then let us remind you that after ‘Thain Thain’ event, a facebook event has been organised, which is inviting people to yell “Apna Time Ayega’ on Valentine's Day.
And if you thought that the frenzy is just limited to our nation, you might want to take another guess.
International artist DJ Diplo is apparently awestruck with his line too. He recently uploaded a poster of Gully Boy and morphed his own picture instead of Ranveer Singh’s. “Random White Boy,” he wrote on it.
Gully Boy fever has taken over the international artist as well. For the unversed, DJ Diplo has previously collaborated with Shah Rukh Khan for a song in Jab Harry Met Sejal. Remember this?
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 544 SHARES 411 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
Gully Boy is hitting the screens on Feb 14.
title: Ranveer Singh’s Gully Boy Fever Hits DJ Diplo, Grammy Award Winner Says ‘Mera Time Bhi Ayega’
description: International artist DJ Diplo is apparently awestruck with Ranveer Singh Apna Time Ayega too. He recently uploaded a poster of Gully Boy and morphed his own picture instead of Ranveer Singh’s. “Random White Boy,” he wrote on it. Gully Boy fever has taken over the international artist as well. For the unversed, DJ Diplo has previously collaborated with Shah Rukh Khan for a song in Jab Harry Met Sej
